targets.expr:
sum(
  kube_pod_container_resource_requests{
    resource="cpu",
    namespace="$namespace", 
    pod="$pod", 
    app_name=~"$app_name", 
    app_version=~"$app_version", 
    region=~"$region", 
    cluster_id=~"$cluster_id", 
    env=~"$env"
  } 
  and on(namespace, pod) max by (namespace, pod) (
    kube_pod_status_phase{
      phase="Running", 
      namespace="$namespace", 
      pod="$pod", 
      app_name=~"$app_name", 
      app_version=~"$app_version", 
      region=~"$region", 
      cluster_id=~"$cluster_id", 
      env=~"$env"
    } 
  == 1)
) by (container)

sum(
  kube_pod_container_resource_limits{
    resource="cpu",
    namespace="$namespace", 
    pod="$pod", 
    app_name=~"$app_name", 
    app_version=~"$app_version", 
    region=~"$region", 
    cluster_id=~"$cluster_id", 
    env=~"$env"
  } 
  and on(namespace, pod) max by (namespace, pod) (
    kube_pod_status_phase{
      phase="Running", 
      namespace="$namespace", 
      pod="$pod", 
      app_name=~"$app_name", 
      app_version=~"$app_version", 
      region=~"$region", 
      cluster_id=~"$cluster_id", 
      env=~"$env"
    }
  == 1)
) by (container)

sum(
  kube_pod_container_resource_requests{
    resource="memory", 
    namespace="$namespace", 
    pod="$pod", 
    app_name=~"$app_name", 
    app_version=~"$app_version", 
    region=~"$region", 
    cluster_id=~"$cluster_id", 
    env=~"$env"
  } 
  and on(namespace, pod) max by (namespace, pod) (
    kube_pod_status_phase{
      phase="Running", 
      namespace="$namespace", 
      pod="$pod", 
      app_name=~"$app_name", 
      app_version=~"$app_version", 
      region=~"$region", 
      cluster_id=~"$cluster_id", 
      env=~"$env"
    } 
  == 1)
) by (container)

sum(
  kube_pod_container_resource_limits{
    resource="memory", 
    namespace="$namespace", 
    pod="$pod", 
    app_name=~"$app_name", 
    app_version=~"$app_version", 
    region=~"$region", 
    cluster_id=~"$cluster_id", 
    env=~"$env"
  } 
  and on(namespace, pod) max by (namespace, pod) (
    kube_pod_status_phase{
      phase="Running", 
      namespace="$namespace", 
      pod="$pod", 
      app_name=~"$app_name", 
      app_version=~"$app_version", 
      region=~"$region", 
      cluster_id=~"$cluster_id", 
      env=~"$env"
    } 
  == 1)
) by (container)

sum(
  ${rate_func}(
    label_replace(
      container_cpu_time_seconds_total{
        k8s_container_name!="", 
        k8s_namespace_name="$namespace", 
        k8s_pod_name="$pod", 
        app_name=~"$app_name", 
        app_version=~"$app_version", 
        region=~"$region", 
        cluster_id=~"$cluster_id", 
        env=~"$env"
      },
      "container",
      "$1",
      "k8s_container_name",
      "(.+)"
    )[$__rate_interval]
  )
) by (container)

sum(
  label_replace(
    container_memory_working_set_bytes{
      k8s_container_name!="", 
      k8s_namespace_name="$namespace", 
      k8s_pod_name="$pod", 
      app_name=~"$app_name", 
      app_version=~"$app_version", 
      region=~"$region", 
      cluster_id=~"$cluster_id", 
      env=~"$env"
    },
    "container",
    "$1",
    "k8s_container_name",
    "(.+)"
  )
) by (container)

panels.title: CPU Utilization / Requests & Limits by Container

targets.expr:
sum(
  label_replace(
    container_memory_working_set_bytes{
      k8s_namespace_name="$namespace",
      k8s_pod_name="$pod",
      k8s_container_name!="",
      app_name=~"$app_name",
      app_version=~"$app_version",
      region=~"$region",
      cluster_id=~"$cluster_id",
      env=~"$env"
    },
    "container",
    "$1",
    "k8s_container_name",
    "(.+)"
  )
) by (container) / sum(
  kube_pod_container_resource_requests{
    namespace="$namespace",
    pod="$pod",
    resource="memory",
    app_name=~"$app_name",
    app_version=~"$app_version",
    region=~"$region",
    cluster_id=~"$cluster_id",
    env=~"$env"
  }
  and on(namespace, pod) max by (namespace, pod) (
    kube_pod_status_phase{
      phase="Running",
      namespace="$namespace",
      pod="$pod",
      app_name=~"$app_name",
      app_version=~"$app_version",
      region=~"$region",
      cluster_id=~"$cluster_id",
      env=~"$env"
    } == 1
  )
) by (container)

sum(
  label_replace(
    container_memory_working_set_bytes{
      k8s_namespace_name="$namespace",
      k8s_pod_name="$pod",
      k8s_container_name!="",
      app_name=~"$app_name",
      app_version=~"$app_version",
      region=~"$region",
      cluster_id=~"$cluster_id",
      env=~"$env"
    },
    "container",
    "$1",
    "k8s_container_name",
    "(.+)"
  )
) by (container) / sum(
  kube_pod_container_resource_limits{
    namespace="$namespace",
    pod="$pod",
    resource="memory",
    app_name=~"$app_name",
    app_version=~"$app_version",
    region=~"$region",
    cluster_id=~"$cluster_id",
    env=~"$env"
  }
  and on(namespace, pod) max by (namespace, pod) (
    kube_pod_status_phase{
      phase="Running",
      namespace="$namespace",
      pod="$pod",
      app_name=~"$app_name",
      app_version=~"$app_version",
      region=~"$region",
      cluster_id=~"$cluster_id",
      env=~"$env"
    } == 1
  )
) by (container)

panels.title: RAM Utilization / Requests & Limits by Container

targets.expr:
sum(
  ${rate_func}(
    label_replace(
      container_cpu_time_seconds_total{
        k8s_namespace_name="$namespace",
        k8s_pod_name="$pod",
        k8s_container_name!="",
        app_name=~"$app_name",
        app_version=~"$app_version",
        region=~"$region",
        cluster_id=~"$cluster_id",
        env=~"$env"
      },
      "container",
      "$1",
      "k8s_container_name",
      "(.+)"
    )[$__rate_interval]
  )
) by (container, id)

sum(
  label_replace(
    container_memory_working_set_bytes{
      k8s_namespace_name="$namespace",
      k8s_pod_name="$pod",
      k8s_container_name!="",
      app_name=~"$app_name",
      app_version=~"$app_version",
      region=~"$region",
      cluster_id=~"$cluster_id",
      env=~"$env"
    },
    "container",
    "$1",
    "k8s_container_name",
    "(.+)"
  )
) by (container, id)

sum(
  ${rate_func}(
    label_replace(
      container_cpu_cfs_throttled_seconds_total{
        k8s_namespace_name="$namespace",
        k8s_pod_name="$pod",
        k8s_container_name!="",
        app_name=~"$app_name",
        app_version=~"$app_version",
        region=~"$region",
        cluster_id=~"$cluster_id",
        env=~"$env"
      },
      "container",
      "$1",
      "k8s_container_name",
      "(.+)"
    )[$__rate_interval]
  )
) by (container)

kube_pod_container_status_waiting_reason{
  reason=~"ErrImagePull|ImagePullBackOff|CrashLoopBackOff", 
  app_name=~"$app_name", 
  app_version=~"$app_version", 
  region=~"$region", 
  cluster_id=~"$cluster_id", 
  env=~"$env"
} == 1

kube_pod_status_scheduled{
  condition="false", 
  app_name=~"$app_name", 
  app_version=~"$app_version", 
  region=~"$region", 
  cluster_id=~"$cluster_id", 
  env=~"$env"
} == 1

sum(
  ${rate_func}(
    k8s_pod_network_io_bytes_total{
      direction="receive", 
      k8s_namespace_name="$namespace", 
      k8s_pod_name="$pod", 
      app_name=~"$app_name", 
      app_version=~"$app_version", 
      region=~"$region", 
      cluster_id=~"$cluster_id", 
      env=~"$env"
    }[$__rate_interval]
  )
)

- sum(
  ${rate_func}(
    k8s_pod_network_io_bytes_total{
      direction="transmit", 
      k8s_namespace_name="$namespace", 
      k8s_pod_name="$pod", 
      app_name=~"$app_name", 
      app_version=~"$app_version", 
      region=~"$region", 
      cluster_id=~"$cluster_id", 
      env=~"$env"
    }[$__rate_interval]
  )
)

sum(
  ${rate_func}(
    k8s_pod_network_errors_total{
      direction="receive", 
      k8s_namespace_name="$namespace", 
      k8s_pod_name="$pod", 
      app_name=~"$app_name", 
      app_version=~"$app_version", 
      region=~"$region", 
      cluster_id=~"$cluster_id", 
      env=~"$env"
    }[$__rate_interval]
  )
)

- sum(
  ${rate_func}(
    k8s_pod_network_errors_total{
      direction="transmit", 
      k8s_namespace_name="$namespace", 
      k8s_pod_name="$pod", 
      app_name=~"$app_name", 
      app_version=~"$app_version", 
      region=~"$region", 
      cluster_id=~"$cluster_id", 
      env=~"$env"
    }[$__rate_interval]
  )
)

list.description:
This variable controls the mathematical function used to calculate per-second rates across the dashboard.

    Overview (rate): Calculates the average rate over the entire time interval. Best for spotting trends, capacity planning, and long-term views.

    Debug (irate): Calculates the "instant" rate based on the last two data points. Best for high-resolution troubleshooting and catching micro-spikes.

 Warning: irate should only be used when zoomed in to < 1 hour. On longer time ranges (e.g., 7 days), irate ignores most data points between pixels and will provide a misleading representation of your traffic.
list.label: Mode
list.name: rate_func
